content:
Kalischer family

1 Abraham KALISCHER                  1794-96 - ?1829 #20
 + Rywka Lei MUNDIG                  1797
  2o Malka KALISCHER                 1819 #11 - 1819 #5
  2x Elias KALISCHER                 1819-20 - Aug 31, 1888 #328
    + Hanna KESTENBERG            1822 #66 - after 1890
          married Aug 19, 1845 #23
     3x Adolf Samuel KALISZER        Aug 24, 1847 #333
       + Breindel BAZES              Apr 22, 1857 #851
             married Mar 11, 1880 #15
    ??  4o Lorcia KALISCHER          1875 - Oct 6, 1879 #312
        4o Eleonora KALISCHER        Feb 16, 1876 #105
        4x Henryk KALISCHER          Nov 27, 1880 #705 - ? Apr 22, 1884
        4o Regina KALISCHER          Dec 31, 1886 Warszawa
          * Moritz Jakob LANDAU      Jan 11, 1880 Koepenick
                married Jun 25, 1920 Berlin
           5x Henryk LANDAU          Jul 31, 1923
        4x Edward KALISCHER          Aug 22, 1894 Berlin
     3x Jozef KALISZER               Dec 30, 1849 (1850 #9) - 1850 #28
     3x Jakob KALISZER               Sep 7, 1852 #420
       + Sara Jachet VOGELSTRAUCH      Dec 9, 1856 #643
             married Mar 9, 1880 #14
        4o Helena KALISZER           Jan 21, 1879 #97
        4x Ignacy KALISZER           Apr 30, 1880 #252 - Jul 23, 1943 Sobibor
        4x Stanislaw KALISCHER       Sep 16, 1881 #707 - Dec 7, 1888 #484
        4o Regina KALISZER           Oct 15, 1884 #735
        4x Wladyslaw KALISZER        Aug 18, 1887 #649
     3o Regina KALISZER              Sep 19, 1856 #498
       * Szymon KOHN                 Apr 1854 Warsaw
             married Jan 20, 1884 #6
        4o Laura Zofia KOHN          Aug 5, 1885 #436
  2o Sora KALISCHER                  1820 #135
  2o Taube KALISCHER                 1824 #232 - after 1870
    * Markus METZENDORF              1825 - after 1870
          married Dec 4, 1850 #26
     3x Abraham Leib METZENDORF      Apr 11, 1850 #144 - 1851 #67
     3x Joachim METZENDORF           Feb 13, 1852 #94
     3x Lieber METZENDORF            Apr 30, 1853 #192 - after 1870
     3o Chaje METZENDORF             Aug 2, 1859 (1865 #314)
     3o Rachel METZENDORF            Dec 25, 1860 #2760
     3o Rosa METZENDORF              1862 Krakow
  2x Zelig KALISCHER                 1828 #138
